game.shortDescriptionEn: A striking revival of the epitome of 1 vs. 1,000. "DYNASTY WARRIORS 3" and "DYNASTY WARRIORS 3: Xtreme Legends" brought back in striking modern detail. Aim for the peak of 1 vs. 1,000 action in this even more thrilling revival.
